title: Pro Bike Checks: World Champ rainbow customs of Elisa Balsamo & Julian Alaphilippe
content:
This year’s UCI Road World Champions were crowned racing over the Flemish cobbles & short, steep climbs of northern Belgium. And besides winning the honor of racing for the next year in rainbow-striped kit, both Cannondale & Specialized have outfitted their 2021 Elite Road World Champions with custom rainbow-themed aero road bikes, which they’ve already

The post Pro Bike Checks: World Champ rainbow customs of Elisa Balsamo & Julian Alaphilippe appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
